subject: Re: [junit] Re: Passing an object from a TestSuite to the testCases
msgSnippet: Can you keep it as a static field on the Suite, initialized in a @BeforeClass method on the suite? David Saff On Fri, May 22, 2009 at 11:52 AM, aneenageorge_pg
messageBody:
Can you keep it as a static field on the Suite, initialized in a
@BeforeClass method on the suite?

David Saff

On Fri, May 22, 2009 at 11:52 AM, aneenageorge_pg
<aneenageorgepg@...> wrote:
> Junit 4
>
> --- In junit@yahoogroups.com, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
>>
>> JUnit 3 or JUnit 4?
>>
>>    David Saff
>>
>> On Fri, May 22, 2009 at 4:31 AM, aneenageorge_pg
>> <aneenageorgepg@...> wrote:
>> > I have a TestSuite where I am initializing an object. I have to pass this object to all the test cases used within the TestSuite.
>> > In one of the topics the solution provided was to use parameterized classes. But I dont how that's applicable over here.
>> >
>> > Can somebody help me out to solver this. It is very urgent
>> >
>> >
>> > Thanks
>> > Ann
